scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run migrate
scripts.migrate:dev: npx truffle migrate --network dev --reset | tee deployments/deploy.dev.log
scripts.migrate:local-testnet: npx truffle migrate --network local-testnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.local-testnet.log
scripts.migrate:local-mainnet: npx truffle migrate --network local-mainnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.local-mainnet.log
scripts.migrate:testnet: npx truffle migrate --network testnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.testnet.log
scripts.migrate: npx truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.mainnet.log
